bfx.seqenc

Class Color

  • java.lang.Object
    • bfx.seqenc.Color

  • public class Color
extends Object
    Code for manipulating and converting color-encododed DNA sequencies. The dibase to color convertion table is: A C G T N A 0 1 2 3 4 C 1 0 3 2 4 G 2 3 0 1 4 T 3 2 1 0 4 N 4 4 4 4 4 More info about color encoding: http://www3.appliedbiosystems.com/cms/groups/mcb_marketing/documents/generaldocuments/cms_058265.pdf
    Author:
    Leonardo Varuzza
